content: Sorry if this is a stupid question, how do I only run a small subset of benches, i.e library/core/benches/char/methods? Everything I've tried hasn't worked, using that path and other things. I can run x.py bench --stage 0 library/core fine, which runs those benches eventually, but can't run solely those tests

You can add --test-args bench_take_while and it'll only run things containing that substring, IIRC.

(I use this all the time for things like test src\tests\ui --test-args try and such.)
That was exactly what I was looking for, thanks!
